title: Dallas Marathon
descriptions: I completed my first marathon with my good friend and plenty support from other friends and family
We finished with a time of 4 hours and 36 minutes
I have plans to run more marathons with aspirations of breaking 4 hours in my next one

title: Wedding Day
descriptions: My lovely wife and I were married surrounded by our good friends and family
We met during college through mutual friends at our church in the summer of 2017
Our first dance was to "Forever Like That" by Ben Rector

title: Graduated from the University of North Texas
descriptions: I grduated from the Honors College at UNT with a B.S. in Computer Science, minor in Secondary Education, and a 4.0 GPA
Outside of school, I was involved in a campus ministry called FOCUS where I met plenty of great friends and my wife
While at UNT, I also had lots of fun playing baseball for the club team and working out at the gym

title: Birthday
descriptions: My wonderful parents raised me and my twin sister
My parents took us on lots of vacations where I learned to love nature and the outdoors
We also grew up staying plenty busy with sports, music, and, of course, studying for school
